channel.title: Comments on: When I See Toilet Seats Twice A Day, I Must Report It
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: Not yet at least :). But we can be upset about the opposite, right?
item.content:encoded: Not yet at least :). But we can be upset about the opposite, right?

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Obviously you've never been with one of those women who get really upset about the toilet seat not being in the "down" position :)
item.content:encoded: Obviously you’ve never been with one of those women who get really upset about the toilet seat not being in the “down” position :)

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: While taking Online and Random algorithms course, i thought about it too :). It looks to me like "on demand" strategy is the best in terms of saving energy and preventing unnecessary movements.
item.content:encoded: While taking Online and Random algorithms course, i thought about it too :). It looks to me like “on demand” strategy is the best in terms of saving energy and preventing unnecessary movements.
